item.title: Settings
item.description: Account Here you set your name, surnameÂ and password. If you have the right permissions, you can: Change your invoice details; Import existing projects. Team Since you have the right permissions, you can: invite people, assign specific roles and allow special permissions. To invite a new teammate: Click on the top left “+ new user” button; Assign a user level, a *role *and the email address of the person you want to invite; Click the “invite” button.
